
name(Race On Sunrise)

snap(0,0,0)

sky(199,233,255)
fog(255,235,204)
ground(192,204,195)
polys(186,199,201)

fadefrom(5000)
density(6)

nlaps(6)

set(47,0,0,0)p
set(14,0,4300,0)pt
set(10,3800,4300,90)p
set(10,8600,4300,90)p
set(31,11456,4300,-90)pr

fix(41,22365,4300,-3500,90)s
fix(41,24576,2200,-3500,90)s
fix(41,22365,4300,-5000,90)s

set(23,26800,4300,-90)p
set(10,28200,4300,90)
set(10,31800,4300,90)
set(10,34200,4300,90)p
set(10,38100,4300,90)p
chk(40,39700,4300,90)
set(14,42600,4300,-90)pt

set(10,42600,400,0)p
set(10,42600,-5200,0)p
chk(40,42600,-7400,0)
set(14,42600,-9700,-180)pt
set(10,38200,-9700,-90)p

set(10,34500,-9700,90)p
set(26,31500,-9700,90)pr
set(10,30000,-9700,90)p
set(10,25500,-9700,90)p

set(10,16500,-9700,90)p

set(10,12000,-9700,90)

set(32,9000,-9300,90)
set(32,9000,-10000,90)

set(10,0,-5600,0)

set(22,2500,-9700,90)
set(22,3000,-9700,90)
set(22,3500,-9700,90)

set(24,8500,-2700,90)

set(23,48600,-10700,0)

fix(41,20300,-2700,-3000,90)


chk(40,2000,4300,90)

set(36,50500,1900,-90)
set(36,50500,0,-90)
set(36,50500,-1900,-90)
set(36,50500,-3800,-90)
set(36,50500,-4700,-90)
